mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO MEMBERTB (MEMBERNO, MEMBERID, MEMBERPASS, MEMBERNICK, MEMBEREMAIL, MEMBERGENDER, MEMBERBIRTH, MEMBERREGDT, MEMBERADMIN) VALUES (MEMBERTB_SEQ.nextval, #{memberid}, #{memberpass}, #{membernick}, #{memberemail}, #{membergender}, #{memberbirth}, SYSDATE, #{memberadmin})
SELECT NVL(MAX(memberno), 0) FROM MEMBERTB
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberid} AND MEMBERPASS = #{memberpass}
